message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI

The paper proposes a tool for 3D semantic segmentation using virtual reality, which is a computer vision and graphics task (cs.CV). The tool also integrates multi-user annotations and computes label uncertainty, which involves machine learning and optimization (cs.LG, cs.AI). The use of virtual reality also suggests a potential application in robotics and automation (cs.RO). Finally, the paper presents results on both indoor and outdoor environments, which could be relevant to graphics and visualization (cs.GR).
